name: Endless Space Defender
description:
Welcome to Endless Space Defender!

Destroy asteroids and enemy spaceships in an endless simple action shooting game where the longer you survive, the more enemies will appear with more health and damage.

Power-ups will not upgrade your stats or health, the more damaged you are, the more power you will gain. Your health will be complete only at the beginning, so keep your spaceship safe.

A humble tribute to the Argentinian arcade "Nave".
